overview: What came first the chicken or the orgasm? You will have to watch long legged Fenna and Filipino Analyn's sexual encounter to find out. 'JUST FORGET ABOUT THE CHICKEN!' said Fenna and if faced with Analyn's dark nipples wouldn't you? These two friends share an intimate, caring, sexual afternoon with us. We don't know if it was the neighbors constant drilling that put the idea into Fenna's head, but nothing was going to stop her from ripping Analyn away from her book and into her arms.
title: Girls Needing Girls
